notesStmt.note: Some worming to outermost membrane including thinned areas on verso.
Edges and outward facing area slightly mottled from damp.
Tear at centre of inner short edge and some creasing from overtight rolling.
Pencilled notes on verso of outermost membrane.
Lists of Oriental manuscripts, Asian and African Studies reading room; recorded in the list in 1979

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 8; ruled lines: 28; written lines: 28; Uniform layout. Ruling by hard point, membrane by membrane. Visible pricking for ruling. Three to four columns per membrane. Three tagin on most of שעטנזגץ, and one on some of אבדהחיק; the letter ח arched throughout. Several majuscular and minuscular letters. The names of the sons of Haman arranged in 11 lines, in accordance with the rule.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi square script of the 16th to 17th century.
